The correct chronological order of the sub-events is:

- (1) The narrator says, "the ultimate guide on how to juggle a soccer ball."
- (2) A green "PRE MATCH SUCCESS GUIDE" banner appears while the red-uniformed player juggles outdoors.
- (3) The coach says his upper body is "nice and relaxed," not flexing, during a demo.
- (4) The coach states, "you're not hitting it hard enough," about the ball not reaching height.
- (5) The scene switches indoors; a blue-and-red jersey appears with the "Progressive Soccer" logo on screen.

Therefore, the correct answer is option B: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5.

The correct chronological order is: (1) The coach explains a "foot stall," emphasizing flexed toes and tension in the shin/ankle. (2) The speaker says players get frustrated and "blast the ball away." (3) A red "JOIN THE ONLINE SOCCER ACADEMY" banner appears at the bottom of the screen. (4) The text "14" appears as a player in a black tracksuit juggles in front of the goal. (5) The narrator says juggling is "like riding a bike," as the video shows a website call-to-action screen. Therefore, the correct order is option B: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5.
